title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions:
Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - your ultimate companion for travel, outdoor adventures, and poolside relaxation. With its sleek, black design and portable size, this speaker is not only stylish but also incredibly versatile.

Experience deep, clear, and immersive audio quality like never before. The Bose SoundLink Flex boasts exclusive technologies such as PositionIQ and custom-engineered transducers that deliver superior sound. And with a waterproof rating of IP67, this speaker is ready for any weather condition or water adventure. It even floats on water!

Durability is at the heart of this product - it's resistant to water, dust, drops, corrosion, and UV light. The compact design makes it easy to hold and store, while the utility loop ensures added security. And with a battery life of up to 12 hours, you can enjoy your music all day long.

Stay connected with Bluetooth technology, making it simple to pair with your devices. Plus, access Siri or Google Assistant directly from the speaker for hands-free control. The Bose Connect App allows for software updates and customizable settings, ensuring your listening experience remains top-notch.

Whether you're hiking, camping, or lounging by the pool, the Bose SoundLink Flex is there to deliver exceptional audio and convenience. Invest in a speaker that delivers on all fronts - invest in the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker.

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - your ultimate companion for travel, outdoor adventures, and poolside relaxation! This sleek, black portable speaker is not only stylish but also packed with advanced features to deliver an unrivaled audio experience.

Experience deep, clear, and immersive sound quality like never before, thanks to Bose's exclusive technologies including PositionIQ technology and a custom-engineered transducer. Whether you're listening to your favorite tunes or taking calls on the go, this speaker delivers an audio experience that will leave you feeling engaged and connected.

Built for durability, the SoundLink Flex is waterproof (IP67 rating), dust-resistant, shock-resistant, corrosion-resistant, and UV light-resistant. It's designed to withstand the elements, so whether you're hiking, camping, or lounging by the pool, this speaker is up for the challenge! And if dropped accidentally, don't worry - it's been drop-tested to ensure your peace of mind.

With a battery life of up to 12 hours and quick charging via USB-C cable (approximately 4 hours), you can enjoy your music all day long without worrying about running out of power. Plus, the built-in microphone allows for hands-free calls, while access to Siri and Google Assistant makes multitasking a breeze.

With its compact design, utility loop for added security, and floating ability in water, the SoundLink Flex is easy to transport and perfect for any adventure. Connect via Bluetooth within 30 feet, and manage settings with the Bose Connect App - the possibilities are endless!

Upgrade your audio game today with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Experience the difference that comes from combining superior sound quality with rugged durability and convenient portability. Order yours now!

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - your ultimate companion for travel, outdoor adventures, and poolside relaxation! This sleek, Black portable speaker boasts exclusive technologies that deliver deep, clear, and immersive audio.

Engineered with a custom-engineered transducer and PositionIQ technology, the SoundLink Flex ensures exceptional sound quality, adapting to any orientation for optimal performance. Dive in and enjoy waterproof protection with an IP67 rating, making it perfect for pool use or unexpected rain showers.

But its durability doesn't stop there! The SoundLink Flex is built to last, with resistance to water, dust, drops, corrosion, and even UV light. Plus, it floats on water, so you don't have to worry about losing your music in the pool. With a battery life of up to 12 hours and quick USB-C charging, keep the tunes playing all day long!

Equipped with a built-in microphone, easily take hands-free calls or access Siri or Google Assistant for voice commands. Plus, connect it to the Bose Connect App for software updates, customizable settings, and more. With a connection range of up to 30 feet, you'll never miss a beat!

Don't let life's adventures hold you back - grab your Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker today and amplify every moment!

**Advertising Description:**

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - your ultimate companion for travel, outdoor adventures, and poolside relaxation. This sleek, Black Portable Speaker with Microphone boasts deep, clear, and immersive audio quality thanks to its custom-engineered transducer and exclusive PositionIQ technology.

Submerge yourself in the music experience without worrying about water damage with this IP67 waterproof speaker that floats effortlessly on water. Its durability doesn't stop there; it is dust-resistant, shock-resistant, corrosion-resistant, and UV light-resistant, making it your reliable friend in any weather or environment.

Stay connected with its impressive 30 feet Bluetooth range, and answer calls on the go using the built-in microphone, which also provides access to Siri and Google Assistant. The rechargeable Lithium-ion battery supports up to 12 hours of playtime, ensuring uninterrupted entertainment.

With a compact design that is easy to hold and store, a utility loop for added security, and a portable size perfect for travel, this versatile speaker is more than just a gadget - it's an essential accessory for your active lifestyle. Embrace the power of sound, anywhere, anytime with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker.

**Advertising Description:**

Experience the unmatched sound quality of the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. This portable powerhouse is not only sleek and compact but also rugged and durable, making it your ideal companion for all your travels, outdoor adventures, or poolside relaxation. With its IP67 waterproof rating, this speaker can withstand any weather condition or accidental splashes, while its custom-engineered transducer ensures deep, clear, and immersive audio that will leave you spellbound.

Whether you're taking calls on the go, playing your favorite tunes during a picnic, or using it as a conference speaker for virtual meetings, the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker has got you covered with its built-in microphone and Siri and Google Assistant access. Its long-lasting lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge, and the quick USB-C charging ensures that your speaker is always ready for the next adventure.

Moreover, this speaker's robust design boasts water resistance, dust resistance, shock resistance, corrosion resistance, and UV light resistance, making it perfect for any rough terrain or challenging environment. And with its utility loop for added security, you can easily attach it to your backpack, bicycle, or even float it in the pool while you unwind.

So, whether you're hitting the road, exploring nature, or lounging by the water, the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is your go-to choice for unparalleled sound and ultimate portability! Connect within 30 feet, and let the music take you on an adventure like never before.

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker: your ultimate companion for travel, outdoor adventures, and poolside relaxation. This sleek, portable speaker, available in a stylish black finish, comes with an impressive array of features designed to deliver deep, clear, and immersive audio experience.

With the latest PositionIQ technology and custom-engineered transducer, the Bose SoundLink Flex delivers exclusive sound quality that sets it apart from any ordinary speaker. But what truly makes this speaker a must-have is its unmatched durability. It's waterproof with an IP67 rating, meaning it can handle even the most adventurous splashes and dunks in the pool. And, it floats! Add to that, dust resistance, shock resistance, corrosion resistance, and UV light resistance - this speaker is built for any terrain and climate.

The Bose SoundLink Flex also comes with a built-in microphone and access to Siri and Google Assistant, making hands-free calls and voice commands a breeze. Its rechargeable lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hours of playtime per charge, and it can be quickly charged using the included USB-C cable in just about 4 hours.

The compact design, portability features like a utility loop, and easy-to-hold and store size make it effortless to take this speaker wherever you go. And with its impressive connection range of up to 30 feet, you'll never miss a beat - whether you're at the beach or in your backyard.

Upgrade your audio experience today with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - the perfect blend of sound quality, durability, and convenience.
